column2:
"From the cute little girls to
the young women I want to experience!
Look at all the choices, meow!"
"It's been a quick few days since I came here... Everyone's got to be talking about me, meow! Which means..."

"This is how I can find out how all
the cuties on the ARKS ship think of me!
That ought to puff me up!"

"I actually want to go
and ask everyone myself, but
unfortunately I only have one body..."

"I want to split up the work, and
go hear what people think of me, meow!
Alright, I'm counting on you!"
